name: Radioiodine-Refractory Differentiated Thyroid Carcinoma with Paraneoplastic Neurological Syndrome
chief_complaint: Persistent neck swelling with recent onset of muscle weakness and memory problems

lab_results.FDG-PET/CT: Diffuse hypermetabolic lesions in thyroid bed, mediastinum, and cerebellum

description: An aggressive form of differentiated thyroid cancer that has lost iodine avidity while developing distant metastases and paraneoplastic neurological manifestations through cross-reacting anti-neuronal antibodies. The condition represents a therapeutic challenge requiring multidisciplinary management combining systemic therapies with neurological support.
multiple_choice: Radioiodine-Refractory Differentiated Thyroid Carcinoma with Paraneoplastic Neurological Syndrome
